newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-Wool International sells Sydney Wool Centre.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-Wool International sells Sydney Wool Centre.

text.p: Wool International said on Wednesday it has sold its Sydney Wool Centre property for A$75 million to an investment syndicate.
Proceeds from the sale of the warehouse, handling and sales facility would be set aside in Wool International's non-wool asset reserves, it said.
Wool International said it would be leasing back space on the property to store wool.
Wool International inherited ownership of the complex from the former Australian Wool Corp in 1991 after the collapse reserve price scheme. -- Sydney Newsroom 61-2 9373-1800
